title: The Long View
description: At five, they slaughtered her parents and doomed her to slavery.At seventeen, she was an exile from Earth, learning new and forbidden worlds.At eighteen, she commanded an army in space. The final battle draws near. While Earth groans under the tyranny of UET, the armada commanded by Rissa and Treegare approaches from deep space. This is Risa's finest hours. She has returned to claim her destiny. --
author: F.M. Busby
